mapper.insert: insert into info(kind_pk, board_pk, userId) values (#{kind_pk}, #{board_pk}, #{userId})
mapper.delete: delete from info where kind_pk=#{kind_pk} and board_pk=#{board_pk} and userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: select * from info where kind_pk=#{kind_pk} and board_pk=#{board_pk} order by info_pk desc
mapper.insert: insert into info(kind_pk, board_pk, userId, reply) values (#{kind_pk}, #{board_pk}, #{userId}, #{reply})
